home.title: Vankyle ID
home.description: It's all here with Vankyle ID.
home.introduction: Your Vankyle ID connects all your Vankyle apps and services. Sign in to manage your account.

login.title: Sign In
login.description: Sign in to your Vankyle ID
login.agree_terms: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
login.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
login.error_403: You are not authorized to access this page.

consent.select_what: Select what information you want to share with this app.
consent.description: Your consent to provide access is required. If you do not approve, click Cancel, in which case no information will be shared with the app.
consent.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

register.title: Sign Up
register.introduction: Your Vankyle ID connects all your Vankyle apps and services. Sign in to manage your account.
register.name: Name
register.password_rules: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one lowercase letter, and one number.
register.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
register.email_activate_description: We sent a activation link to the email address. Please click the link to activate your account.
register.phone_activate_description: We sent a activation code to the phone number. Please enter the code below to activate your account.
register.existing_account: This email address is already registered. Please sign in.

picture.title: Picture
picture.description: Personalize your account with a photo. Your profile photo will appear on apps and devices that use your Vankyle ID.
picture.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name is public and will appear on our profile.
name.not_set: We have not set the name yet.
name.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

email.title: Email
email.description: The email is to receive important information about our account.
email.not_set: We have not set the email yet.
email.verify_sent_description: We sent a verification code to the email address. Please enter the code below to verify our email address.
email.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: We need your phone number to send you important information about your account.
phone.not_set: We have not set the phone number yet.
phone.verify_sent_description: We sent a verification code to the phone number. Please enter the code below to verify our phone number.
phone.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

password.title: Change Password
password.description: A strong password helps prevent unauthorized access to your account.
password.password_rules: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one lowercase letter, and one number.
password.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.description: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.not_exist_account: There is no account with this email address.
forgot_password.email_sent_description: We sent a link to reset your password to the email address. Please check your email.
forgot_password.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.password_rules: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one lowercase letter, and one number.
reset_password.invalid: Your password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
reset_password.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

confirm_email.title: Confirm Email
confirm_email.description: Please check your email for a confirmation link.
confirm_email.invalid: Your email confirmation link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
confirm_email.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

utils.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
utils.not_found: The requested page was not found.
utils.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
